title: Accept Contactless Payments & Cards | Benefits of Mastercard Contactless Payments
description: With Mastercard Contactless payments, allow your customers to make purchases by simply tapping or waving their enabled card or with their phones using mobile NFC.

data.heading: How to accept Mastercard contactless
para:
To accept contactless payments, merchants can choose to implement a plug-in peripheral reader or a fully integrated system.
Contact your acquirer or payment processor to learn how to begin accepting Mastercard contactless payments.

data.heading: Protect your business
para: Mastercard is committed to keeping your business safer and more secure.

data.heading: Unique and exclusive benefits
para: Mastercard works with partners worldwide to bring your business money-saving offers plus Priceless experiences to share with your customers.

data.heading: How Tap & Go® payments work
para: Customers can pay by tapping or waving their enabled card or smart device on a contactless-enabled point-of-sale (POS) reader.
